item.title: 韩国企业集团韩华海运订购首艘美国液化天然气运输船
item.description: 韩华海洋（Hanwha Ocean）的美国子公司韩华海运（Hanwha Shipping）向其关联公司韩华菲利船厂（Hanwha Philly Shipyard）订购了一艘液化天然气船，这是自 20 世纪 70 年代末以来订购的第一艘美国液化天然气船。【原文：Hanwha Shipping, the American subsidiary of Hanwha Ocean, ordered a liquefied natural gas vessel from its affiliate Hanwha Philly Shipyard, marking the first US LNG ordered ship since the late 1970s, the company said.】

item.title: 花旗策略师称印尼盾将在进一步上涨前盘整
item.description: 据印尼盾的顶级预测机构称，印尼盾近期的涨势将在下个月暂停，然后再回升到 12 月份的水平。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah’s recent gains are set to pause in the coming month before advancing to levels last seen in December, according to the currency’s top forecaster.】

item.title: 贸易谈判在最后期限前愈演愈烈，原油保持跌势
item.description: 由于美国与其贸易伙伴之间的谈判在下周的最后期限到来之前变得更加紧迫，石油价格在两次小幅下跌之后变化不大。【原文：Oil was little changed after two modest declines as talks between the US and its trading partners gain urgency ahead of next week’s deadline.】

item.title: 贝森特表示需要对美联储大楼翻新进行审查
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一在社交媒体上发文称，应该对华盛顿美联储总部的部分翻修决定进行审查。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said in a social media post Monday that there should be a review of the decision to renovate parts of the Federal Reserve headquarters in Washington.】

item.title: 英国零售商要求在旅游计划中恢复免税购物
item.description: 英国零售商正再次努力说服英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）恢复游客免税购物，因为政府正准备制定促进所谓游客经济的计划。【原文：UK retailers are renewing efforts to persuade Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves to bring back tax-free shopping for tourists, as the government prepares to set out its plan to boost the so-called visitor economy.】

item.title: 中国子弟兵与同父异母兄弟姐妹的争斗发出接班警告
item.description: 几十年来，宗庆后一直是已故亿万富翁、饮料帝国杭州娃哈哈集团有限公司创始人宗庆后的独生女。 在独生子女政策时代，宗庆后努力培养她成为接班人，被誉为中国企业家的楷模。【原文：For decades, Kelly Zong had been known as the only child to her late billionaire father, the founder of beverage empire Hangzhou Wahaha Group Co. His effort to groom her as a successor was hailed as a model for Chinese entrepreneurs during the one-child policy era.】

item.title: 中国掉期曲线趋于正常，通缩担忧开始缓解
item.description: 中国货币市场的扭曲现象在持续了整整一年之后已经消失，这是一个初步迹象，表明投资者期望最新的刺激措施能够重振经济。【原文：A distortion in China’s money market has vanished after persisting throughout this year, a nascent sign that investors expect the latest stimulus efforts to reflate the economy.】

item.title: T.T Rowe看好泰国和马来西亚债券的降息空间
item.description: T.罗尔-普莱斯集团公司（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. likes local bonds in Thailand and Malaysia, betting that further monetary easing will outweigh currency gains as a key driver of investor returns.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势减弱，亚洲股市低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市周一回吐大部分涨幅后，亚洲股市开盘表现平淡，交易员们在关税风险中寻找企业盈利的韧性迹象。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a muted open after US stocks gave up most of their gains on Monday, with traders looking for signs of resilience in corporate earnings amid tariff risks.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）已秘密申请在美国上市，这将履行与亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的对冲基金潘兴广场（Pershing Square）达成的协议条款。【原文：Universal Music Group NV has filed confidentially for a US listing, which would fulfill the terms of a deal with billionaire Bill Ackman’s hedge fund Pershing Square.】

item.title: 基金巨头相信 "特朗普看跌期权 "将使股市持续上涨
item.description: 随着美国股市不畏持续的贸易和地缘政治紧张局势创下新高，全球最大的一批资产管理公司正加大力度支持风险资产的反弹。【原文：A cohort of the world’s largest asset managers is leaning harder into the rally in risk assets as US stocks push to fresh highs, defying persistent trade and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 要求美国证券交易委员会谨慎对待代币化问题
item.description: Citadel Securities 希望美国证券交易委员会在允许 "代币化 "证券起飞方面放慢脚步。【原文：Citadel Securities wants the US Securities and Exchange Commission to proceed more slowly on allowing “tokenized” securities to take off.】

item.title: 上议院选举结果公布后的金融市场趋势。
item.description: 上议院选举结束后，石破茂在党总部喝水。摄影师：Toru Hanai/BloombergToru Hanai/Bloomberg【原文：Shigeru Ishiba drinks water at the party's headquarters following the upper house election. Photographer: Toru Hanai/Bloomberg】

item.title: 巴西调查与特朗普关税消息有关的涉嫌内幕交易行为
item.description: 最高法院法官下令对美国宣布对巴西商品征收关税前后巴西货币市场可能出现的内幕交易进行调查。【原文：A Supreme Court judge ordered an investigation into potential insider trading in Brazil’s currency markets around the announcement of US tariffs on Brazilian goods.】

item.title: 巴西矿工被警告可能遭受 10 亿美元的关税损失
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁从 8 月 1 日起征收 50%的关税，巴西矿业界警告说，如果政府采取对等关税报复措施，将会产生严重的经济后果。【原文：The Brazilian mining industry is warning of dire economic consequences if the government resorts to reciprocal tariffs in retaliation for US President Donald Trump’s threatened 50% levy starting Aug. 1.】

item.title: 战略公司在最新优先股权销售中寻求 5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司正在寻求从其最新的优先股销售中筹集至少 5 亿美元的资金，提供一种可变利率证券，为更多的比特币购买提供资金。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy is seeking to raise at least $500 million from its latest sale of preferred equity, offering a variable-rate security to fund more Bitcoin purchases.】

item.title: 甲骨文正在洽谈1亿美元的Skydance-Paramount云计算交易
item.description: 甲骨文公司正在与 Skydance Media LLC 商讨，一旦该媒体公司完成对 Paramount Global 的收购，甲骨文公司将与 Skydance Media LLC 签订一项大型软件交易。【原文：Oracle Corp. is in discussions with Skydance Media LLC for a major software deal once the media company’s acquisition of Paramount Global is complete.】

item.title: 资本收益黑洞"：ETF 中的税收新花招
item.description:
投资者正在利用一个臭名昭著的漏洞来冲销应税收益，为 ETF 提供升值资产。【原文：

Investors are seeding ETFs with appreciated assets, taking advantage of an infamous loophole to wash out taxable gains.

】

item.title: 不受欢迎的石原莞尔坚守阵地，日本债券和股票走势疲软
item.description: 日本首相石破茂在大选中遭到历史性失败后，日本政府债券在周二恢复交易时很容易遭到进一步抛售。【原文：Japanese government bonds are vulnerable to further selling when trading resumes Tuesday following a historic election defeat for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba.】

item.title: 太空公司卡曼的投资者提议出售 2,000 万股股票
item.description: 卡曼控股公司（Karman Holdings Inc.【原文：A group of investors in Karman Holdings Inc. including an affiliate of its largest shareholder is offering to sell 20 million shares in the company, nearly five months after its IPO.】

item.title: 德意志银行预计鲍威尔退出后 30 年期收益率将上升半个百分点
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的策略师表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统可能让美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔下台，这将使 30 年期国债收益率上升半个百分点以上。【原文：The potential ouster of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell by President Donald Trump would drive the 30-year Treasury yield higher by more than half a percentage point, according to Deutsche Bank AG strategists.】

item.title: 汽车芯片销售持续低迷，恩智浦股价下跌
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）受汽车市场低迷的影响，公布第二季度销售额下滑，该公司股价在尾盘交易中下滑。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV shares slid in late trading after the chipmaker posted a second-quarter sales decline, hurt by a sluggish automotive market.】

item.title: 萨克斯寻求少数贷款人交易后启动债务转换
item.description: 萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）周一发表声明称，随着其 6 亿美元新融资的成形，经过与债权人数周的谈判，萨克斯全球企业已启动债务交换。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises has launched a debt exchange following weeks of negotiations with creditors as its $600 million fresh financing takes shape, according to a Monday statement.】

item.title: DoubleLine 副首席信息官为 "影子美联储 "推动利率下行做准备
item.description: 双线资本（DoubleLine Capital）的杰弗里-谢尔曼（Jeffrey Sherman）是支持一种债券交易的投资者之一，这种交易已成为对冲唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇美联储主席风险的一种常用方式。【原文：DoubleLine Capital’s Jeffrey Sherman is among investors backing a bond trade that’s emerged as a go-to way to hedge against the risk that President Donald Trump moves to fire the Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: Netflix 使用初创公司 Runway AI 的视频制作工具
item.description: Netflix 公司已开始使用初创公司 Runway AI 开发的人工智能视频生成软件，试水这项在好莱坞备受争议的技术。【原文：Netflix Inc. has begun using artificial intelligence video generation software from startup Runway AI, testing the waters with a technology that’s controversial in Hollywood.】

item.title: 芝加哥价值 10 亿美元的量子计算机将于 2028 年开始运行
item.description: 芝加哥 10 多亿美元量子计算交易背后的初创公司表示，预计将在三年内开始运营，这对伊利诺伊州州长 JB-普利兹克（JB Pritzker）来说是一次胜利，他支持这项投资，并被广泛视为潜在的总统候选人。【原文：The startup behind Chicago’s more than $1 billion quantum computing deal said operations are expected to start in three years, a win for Illinois Governor JB Pritzker, who backed the investment and is widely seen as a potential presidential candidate.】

item.title: 美国共和党议员卢纳将鲍威尔作伪证的指控提交给司法部
item.description: 共和党众议员安娜-保利娜-卢纳（Anna Paulina Luna）要求司法部考虑调查和起诉美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在国会委员会作证时涉嫌宣誓说谎。【原文：Republican Representative Anna Paulina Luna has asked the Department of Justice to consider investigating and prosecuting Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for allegedly lying under oath in testimony before a congressional committee.】

item.title: 阿根廷 5 月经济出现 2025 年以来第三次萎缩
item.description: 由于此前的工资下降和失业率上升可能对消费者支出造成压力，阿根廷经济在 5 月份出现了今年以来的第三次萎缩。【原文：Argentina’s economy contracted in May for the third time this year as previous wage declines and rising unemployment likely put pressure on consumer spending.】

item.title: Opendoor股价大涨，交易员纷纷涌入最新的 "备忘录 "股票
item.description: Opendoor Technologies Inc. 周一大涨 120%，延续了上周的反弹势头，投资者继续追捧这只在散户和社交媒体平台上突然走红的股票。【原文：Opendoor Technologies Inc. jumped 120% on Monday, extending its gravity-defying rally from last week, as investors continued to pile into the stock that has found a sudden fandom among retail traders and social-media platforms.】

item.title: NIQ 12 亿美元 IPO 将检验投资者对 PE 公司退出的渴望
item.description: 全球消费者情报平台 NIQ Global Intelligence Plc 的股票预计将于本周开始交易，其表现可能会为其他私募股权支持的公司打开上市的大门。【原文：Shares of global consumer intelligence platform NIQ Global Intelligence Plc are expected to start trading this week, and their performance could open the door for other private equity-backed companies weighing going public.】
